__e: Looking at the best case scenario, let's suppose the boy is unique and he doesn't understand what he's just done.
I believe that each of us has a role in life.
But I was his rebound girl, if I'm gonna be honest with myself, and he was also well, unique, in ways that mean I should probably stay away from him.
I will call upon a visitor to our nation, a young man who has come from afar to tell us that our predicament is not unique, that once upon a time there was another world, very much like our own,
If one thing is unique, the other six things should probably be, um... - ... something else.
I know that my path has been unique, and I am grateful for that.
